definition: to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Provision or retire infrastructure as required.
sentences.chinese: 需要規定或者棄用基礎。

sentences.english: You can ignore warnings about deprecated functions.
sentences.chinese: 可以忽略關於棄用功能的警告。

sentences.english: Deprecated functions will continue to work.
sentences.chinese: 棄用功能將會繼續工作。

sentences.english: Yardsticks seldom are discarded while yielding favorable readings.
sentences.chinese: 在產生良好的讀數時，衡量尺度極少被棄用。

sentences.english: You might see warnings in the task list about functions that have been deprecated. These warnings are usually in the following format
sentences.chinese: 您可能看到任務列表中關於已被棄用功能的警告。
